data_table.description: Reader-Trend-Shift-Adjusted Ultrasound, Black Females, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LBICWT45
variable.description: Weight for LBI: < 1 Implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: RBICWT45
variable.description: Weight for RBI: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: LINCWT45
variable.description: Weight for LIN: < 1 Implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: RINCWT45
variable.description: Weight for RIN: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: LOPCWT45
variable.description: Weight for LOP: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: ROPCWT45
variable.description: Weight for ROP: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: LBICJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T Adjusted av45, shifted, LBI [left bifurcation] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: RBICJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, RBI [right bifurcation] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: LINCJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T Adjusted av45, shifted, LIN [left internal carotid] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: RINCJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, RIN [right internal carotid] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: LOPCJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, LOP [left common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: ROPCJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, ROP [right common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: SUMWTC45
variable.description: Weight for MNC45_1S(=no. of obs sites/6) [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: MNC45_1S
variable.description: Mean of the JS45 variables [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 3]
